risk.gamePlayer

Class GameDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • risk.controller.GameDriver

  • public class GameDriver
extends java.lang.Object
    this class controls the flow of the game based on the risk game rules, this class uses singleton design pattern it has following data memebers:
    • graph
    • players
    • staticColorList colors of the players
    • gameDriver a dataType of GameDriver class
    • index contains the index of current player in round robin fashion
    Author:
    Farid Omarzadeh

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeCurrentPlayer()
      this method changes the current player in a round robin fashion
      void fortify(Node node1, Node node2, int armies)
      this method is being used in fortification phase it transfer armies from one country to another.
      int getAllArmies()
      this method returns the sum of the all armies that each player has
      Player getCurrentPlayer()
      this method returns the current player who is going to play
      static GameDriver getGameDriverInstance()
      this method returns an instance of the GameDriver class, if the instance is null the object will be newed, otherwise it will return the already existing instance of the class.
      java.util.List<Player> getPlayers()
      get method for players
      Player getReinforcementPlayer()
      this method calculate the amount of armies each player receives based on the number of countries they own and continents they conquered
      void setPlayers(int numberOfPlayers)
      this method create players for the game ,randomly assign countries to them, and initialize number of armies for them.

    • Method Detail

      • getReinforcementPlayer

        public Player getReinforcementPlayer()
        this method calculate the amount of armies each player receives based on the number of countries they own and continents they conquered
        Returns:
        Player that will be used in reinforcement phase

      • getGameDriverInstance

        public static GameDriver getGameDriverInstance()
        this method returns an instance of the GameDriver class, if the instance is null the object will be newed, otherwise it will return the already existing instance of the class.
        Returns:
        gameDriver an instance of the class's dataType

      • setPlayers

        public void setPlayers(int numberOfPlayers)
        this method create players for the game ,randomly assign countries to them, and initialize number of armies for them.
        Parameters:
        numberOfPlayers - number of players.

        public int getAllArmies()
        this method returns the sum of the all armies that each player has
        Returns:

      • fortify

        public void fortify(Node node1,
                    Node node2,
                    int armies)
        this method is being used in fortification phase it transfer armies from one country to another.
        Parameters:
        node1 - the country whose armies will be moved
        node2 - the country who will receive armies
        armies - number of armies that will be transfered
